summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the latent diffusion text‑to‑image and super‑resolution pipelines, including lightweight sanity checks, nightly regression tests, and full end‑to‑end validation using both dummy and real model components, while verifying sampling correctness, half‑precision execution, and deterministic behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, correctness, and performance stability of latent diffusion generation and super‑resolution pipelines in production and CI environments.
